exceptions.exn: The reference Hn was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
The reference ss was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

ctx: destruct (getLocal n d) as [cs|ss] eqn: Hget.
exceptions.exn: The reference cs was not found in the current environment.

original: intros n d C Hn. split. - apply (state_coh _ _ C Hn). - destruct (n == server) eqn:Heq. + exists ss. rewrite (eqP Heq). reflexivity. + split. * apply client_nodes, client_not_server, Heq. * destruct (getLocal n d) as [cs|ss] eqn: Hget. { exists cs. reflexivity. } { exfalso. apply (Hnin n). apply (coh_dom_upd n d). apply Hn. apply C. }
